Description: ESP32 Devkit V1 30 pin is the MCU of the project with bluetooth capabilities
The amplifier that sends signal to the speakers
DAC module from MCU to amplifier
EC11 rotary encoder for controlling UI
0.96" Oled display to interact with speaker and control settings like bluetooth, equalization, volume etc
LM2596 Buck converter to step down voltage from battery to ESP32 usable voltage
A 3 series 8650 battery holder to provide power to the project
